title: Banks face seven-year backlog in debt recovery cases
description: Banks struggled with a backlog in debt recovery, expected to take seven years to clear at the current pace. Over 2 lakh cases pending at Debt Recovery Tribunals prompted government plans to boost DRT and NCLT capacity, strengthening the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code. Initiatives aim to enhance debt recovery efficiency and reduce the burden on existing tribunals.
